entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: SSW 14 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
